name: 徐正會
objective:
Prerequisite: professor's approval. Introductions to the criteria of part movements in an operating mechanical system and force transmission between parts. Examples include the introductions of linkage, cam, gear, pure rolling system, sprocket, belt, and rolling cylinder transmission system. 

先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
schedule:
1. 基本概念 Basic Concepts 
2. 運動分析 Kinematic Analysis 
3. 運動性質 Kinematic Properties 
4. 傳遞運動方法 Methods of Motion Transmission 
5. 連桿組介紹 Introduction to Linkages
6. 專用機構介紹 Introduction to Special Mechanisms
7. 瞬時中心 Instant Center
8. 甘迺迪定理 Kennedy Theorem 
9. 期中考 Mid-term Exam
10. 速度分析-瞬時中心法 Velocity Analysis - Instant Center Method
11. 速度分析-分量法 Velocity Analysis - Vector polygon Method 
12. 加速度分析 Acceleration Analysis 
13. 凸輪介紹 Introduction to Cam 
14. 凸輪分析 Cam Analysis 
15. 摩擦傳動 Frictional Transmission 
16. 齒輪介紹 Introduction to Gears
17. 齒輪系分析 Gear Train Analysis
18. 期末考 Final Exam
materials: "Kinematics and Dynamics of Machines," 2/e by George H. Martin
